title: Winter Golf and Leisure Packages at Trump Turnberry ReleasedTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Winter Golf and Leisure Packages at Trump Turnberry Released
As the multi million pound renovation of the hotel and Ailsa course begins, golf and leisure packages at the iconic Trump Turnberry resort have been released for the upcoming winter season.
From 28 September 2015, a range of new autumn lodge offers are available including a great value golf package for those wishing to enjoy the world famous Ayrshire links and the lavishly refurbished Turnberry Clubhouse which opened earlier this year.
Two golfers can play the Kintyre course and enjoy a delicious three course meal in The Duel in the Sun restaurant from only £240 per room per night, with accommodation provided in the Trump Villas.
For guests looking to indulge and relax, then, The Spa at Turnberry is offering special winter packages with accommodation in spacious rooms located above the spa, breakfast, dinner and two 55 minute spa treatments for two for people from just £290 per room.
In addition to the many activities on site throughout the winter, the Turnberry Tea Lounge will continue to serve the resort’s award winning afternoon tea, priced from £28 per person. Located above the spa, this space has far reaching views across to the Isle of Arran and Ailsa Craig and offers guests a relaxed dining experience.
Through the winter, Sunday Brunch also continues on the 1st and 3rd Sunday of the month, with the location changing to The Duel in the Sun Restaurant, priced at £28 per person. The Lands of Turnberry self-catering apartments will also remain open, with pricing from £450 for a three or four night stay.
Source:- IAGTO
